SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT010
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message indicates that a message that was being monitored in case of non-delivery, was not delivered before its obsolescence period expired.
From: FIN To: User

SystemField.Name: mir
SystemField.description:
MIR of the undelivered message,containing:
a) Input date
b) Input LT including branch code
c) Session number
d) ISN

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: mir
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Message input reference of the undelivered message, containing:
a) Input date
b) Input LT including branch code
c) Session number
d) ISN

SystemField.Name: mur
SystemField.description: Contains one of the following: 1.Message User Reference as used in the header of the original message if present. 2.If no message user reference was present in the original message, this tag may contain the contents of field 20 of the original message or (for Category 5 messages only) the contents of field 20C, with the code word SEME, but only when all alphabetical characters are in upper case.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: mur
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Message User Reference as used in the header of the original message

SystemField.Name: msg-status
SystemField.description: Message status (for example, whether delivered or aborted). See the FIN Error Codes module for the full set of error codes.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: msg-status
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Message status (for example, whether delivered or aborted). See the FIN Error Codes module for the full set of error codes.

SystemField.Name: swift-address
SystemField.description: Complete 12-character destination, including LT code and branch code, or default branch code to which the undelivered message was sent.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: swift-address
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Complete 12-character destination, including logical terminal code and branch code, or default branch code XXX.

SystemField.Name: msg-priority
SystemField.description:
Message Priority, where:
a) S = system
b) U = urgent
c) N = normal

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: msg-priority
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Message Priority, where:
a) S = system
b) U = urgent
c) N = normal
